sqlMap.sql: select c.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, c.CATEGORY_CODE as categoryCode from o2ob_v_category_rela r , o2ob_v_category c where r.CATEGORY_ID = c.CATEGORY_CODE and r.GUIDE_ID = :guideId
SELECT a.OUT_CODE FROM o2ob_v_category_out_rel a INNER JOIN o2ob_v_category_rela b ON a.CATEGORY_CODE = b.CATEGORY_ID WHERE b.GUIDE_ID = :guideId
